mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no, bb.b_idx, bb.b_name, e.name, e.position, e.join_year, DATEDIFF(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), e.join_year) AS work_year, a.annualAdd, b.annualSub FROM emp e natural join branch bb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT emp_no, SUM(annual_time) AS annualAdd FROM annual WHERE YEAR(annual_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) and annual_modifier = 1 GROUP BY emp_no ) a ON e.emp_no = a.emp_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT emp_no, SUM(annual_time) AS annualSub FROM annual WHERE YEAR(annual_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) and annual_modifier = 2 GROUP BY emp_no ) b ON e.emp_no = b.emp_no order by e.emp_no desc
